rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with traditional Kerala-style wooden door and a small waiting area.
An open living space with ample natural light and ventilation in line with Vastu guidelines for central gathering spaces.
Adjacent to the living room, designed to be functional yet intimate.
A modern yet traditionally styled kitchen with an open plan connecting to dining and serving areas, ensuring smooth energy flow as per Vastu.
Primary bathroom on the ground floor for convenience during early morning routines.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door with carved detailing.
Louvred windows for privacy and natural light, aligned with Vastu for optimum energy flow.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Fitted with traditional Kerala-style woodwork and natural light to promote well-being.
Bedroom designed for one child, featuring elements of local artistry and proper ventilation.
Connected bathroom to the master bedroom ensuring privacy and energy balance per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Balconies with sliding doors for outdoor views; designed for the master and child bedrooms following Vastu principles.

rooms.description: A rooftop terrace spanning the entire length of the plot for family gatherings and relaxation. Incorporates natural stone paths and traditional Kerala-style seating.
A two-car garage designed to complement the house architecture with ample parking and storage space.
